title: Unseen enemies
creator_credit: Michael Clarke, Stuart Legg and Shell Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the ravages of such diseases as leprosy, malaria, elephantiasis, yaws, yellow fever in various countries and what is being done, mainly through the World Health Organisation to eradicate them.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Clarke, Stuart Legg and Shell Film Unit
